The Mastersingers (Die Meistersinger)
Treorchy, Rhondda Cynon Taf, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £40 and shield, 2nd £20, 3rd £10, 4th £3. Hymn tune contest - 1st Gwaun-cae-Gurwen, 2nd Ystalyfera Town. 8 bands competed.
Sept. 30, 2013, 11:07 a.m. Aug. 14, 2016, 9:23 a.m.
